H0.text: Which brewery makes Lancaster Bomber and Wainwrights fine ale. Adnams Brewery

H1.text: Which brewery makes Lancaster Bomber and Wainwrights fine ale. Greene King

H2.text: Which brewery makes Lancaster Bomber and Wainwrights fine ale. Marston's Brewery

H3.text: Which brewery makes Lancaster Bomber and Wainwrights fine ale. Thwaites

A4.text: Lancaster Bomber, an ale named after the Avro Lancaster aircraft, has been available at Thwaites' public houses since the Marston acquisition and is now brewed by Marston's, as is Wainwright, another Thwaites beer.

A5.text: In March 2015, Marston's bought all rights to Wainwright and Lancaster Bomber and a short-term license to use the Thwaite brand.
